assertions.rationale: All container images must have associated SBOM generated.

assertions.title: Sign SBOM with cryptographic signatures
assertions.rationale: SBOM must be cryptographically signed for authenticity.

assertions.title: Verify build provenance attestations
assertions.rationale: Build provenance must be verified and attested.

assertions.title: Attest build environment integrity
assertions.rationale: Build environment must be attested for security and integrity.

assertions.title: Enforce SBOM policy at deployment
assertions.rationale: Deployment must verify SBOM and provenance before allowing images.

assertions.title: Implement append-only logging
assertions.rationale: Log storage must be configured for append-only operations.

assertions.title: Enable retention lock on logs
assertions.rationale: Log retention locks must prevent premature log deletion.

assertions.title: Protect logs under legal hold
assertions.rationale: Logs under legal hold must be protected from modification.

assertions.title: Ensure tamper-evident log storage
assertions.rationale: Log storage must provide tamper evidence and integrity verification.

assertions.title: Maintain immutable audit trail
assertions.rationale: Audit logs must be stored in immutable format with integrity protection.

assertions.title: Create immutable backup copies
assertions.rationale: Backups must be stored in immutable format to prevent ransomware encryption.

assertions.title: Maintain isolated recovery environment
assertions.rationale: Recovery environment must be isolated from production to prevent reinfection.

assertions.title: Scan backups for malware
assertions.rationale: Backups must be scanned for malware before restoration.

assertions.title: Enable point-in-time recovery
assertions.rationale: Point-in-time recovery must be available for rapid restoration.

assertions.title: Maintain air-gapped backup copies
assertions.rationale: Critical backups must be stored in air-gapped environments.

assertions.title: Track all security exceptions
assertions.rationale: All security policy exceptions must be registered and tracked.

assertions.title: Require approval for exceptions
assertions.rationale: Security exceptions must be approved by designated authority.

assertions.title: Set expiry dates for exceptions
assertions.rationale: Exceptions must have defined expiry dates and be reviewed regularly.

assertions.title: Define compensating controls for exceptions
assertions.rationale: Exceptions must have documented compensating controls.

assertions.title: Monitor exception compliance
assertions.rationale: Exception compliance must be monitored and reported.

assertions.title: Track deprecated API usage
assertions.rationale: Usage of deprecated APIs must be tracked and monitored.

assertions.title: Enforce migration plans for deprecated features
assertions.rationale: Migration plans must be enforced for deprecated platform features.

assertions.title: Send deprecation notifications
assertions.rationale: Users must be notified of API deprecations with sufficient lead time.

assertions.title: Ensure version compliance
assertions.rationale: Platform components must use supported versions only.

assertions.title: Monitor end-of-life components
assertions.rationale: End-of-life components must be identified and replaced.

assertions.title: Excess permissions are restricted for identities
assertions.rationale: Identity and access controls are fundamental to cloud security. Enforcing least privilege reduces blast radius and prevents privilege escalation.

assertions.title: Pod security restrictions are enforced for workloads
assertions.rationale: Container and Kubernetes workload hardening prevents privilege escalation and runtime abuse.

assertions.title: DDoS protection is enabled for internet-facing endpoints
assertions.rationale: DDoS protections reduce risk of denial of service and resource exhaustion for public applications.

assertions.title: Backup coverage and health are monitored
assertions.rationale: Backup management ensures recoverability with consistent policy coverage and timely remediation of failures.

assertions.title: Infrastructure-as-Code scanning is enforced pre-deploy
assertions.rationale: IaC policy scanning and enforcement help prevent misconfigurations from being deployed.

assertions.title: A centralized security risk register is maintained
assertions.rationale: Risk management processes ensure security risks are documented, prioritized, and mitigated.

assertions.title: Security log routing is configured to centralized stores
assertions.rationale: Centralized logging enables detection, investigation, and compliance evidence preservation.

assertions.title: Threat detection rules are configured and active
assertions.rationale: Threat detections surface malicious or risky behaviors for rapid response.

assertions.title: Incident response runbooks are defined and maintained
assertions.rationale: Incident response preparedness reduces mean time to detect and recover from security incidents.

assertions.title: Data sensitivity policies are enforced across data stores
assertions.rationale: Consistent classification drives appropriate controls for sensitive data across platforms.

assertions.title: Vulnerability remediation SLAs are defined and tracked
assertions.rationale: Timely remediation of vulnerabilities reduces exposure to known exploits.

assertions.title: MFA is enforced for all members of privileged groups
assertions.rationale: Group-based MFA ensures all privileged users have strong authentication.

assertions.title: Group-based roles follow least privilege principles
assertions.rationale: Group roles should be scoped to minimum required permissions.

assertions.title: File shares are encrypted at rest and in transit
assertions.rationale: Encryption protects file share data from unauthorized access.

assertions.title: Message queues are encrypted at rest
assertions.rationale: Queue encryption prevents data exposure from message interception.

assertions.title: Database tables are encrypted at rest
assertions.rationale: Table encryption protects structured data at rest.

assertions.title: Storage snapshots are encrypted
assertions.rationale: Snapshot encryption prevents data exposure from backup access.

assertions.title: Persistent volumes are encrypted
assertions.rationale: Volume encryption protects persistent data from unauthorized access.

assertions.title: Only approved golden images are used for compute instances
assertions.rationale: Golden images reduce attack surface and ensure consistent hardening.

assertions.title: Images are scanned for vulnerabilities before deployment
assertions.rationale: Pre-deployment scanning prevents vulnerable images from being deployed.

assertions.title: Instance groups are properly configured for auto-scaling
assertions.rationale: Proper instance group configuration ensures reliable auto-scaling.

assertions.title: Security groups follow least privilege principles
assertions.rationale: Restrictive security group rules reduce attack surface.

assertions.title: Route tables are configured with secure routing policies
assertions.rationale: Secure routing prevents traffic from bypassing security controls.

assertions.title: Kubernetes cluster encryption is enabled
assertions.rationale: Cluster encryption protects etcd and API server data.

assertions.title: Node pools have security configurations applied
assertions.rationale: Node pool security ensures consistent hardening across worker nodes.

assertions.title: Registry access policies are properly configured
assertions.rationale: Registry policies control access to container images and artifacts.

assertions.title: Registry enforces vulnerability scanning on push
assertions.rationale: Automated scanning prevents vulnerable images from entering the registry.
